sentences.sContent: If cryogenics were all free, then you could live like Walt Disney and live for all eternity inside a block of ice.
sentences.sContent_eng: If cryogenics were all free, then you could live like Walt Disney and live for all eternity inside a block of ice.
sentences.sCn: 如果低温冷冻是免费的，那么你会像华尔特•迪斯尼一样生活并在一大块冰内永生。

sentences.sContent_eng: More than four million samples will be preserved near the North Pole without the need for expensive cryogenics (see
sentences.sCn: 超过400万份种子保存在了北极附近，而不需要昂贵的低温保存（见  全球种子库在挪威开放）。

sentences.sContent: More than four million samples will be preserved near the North Pole without the need for expensive cryogenics (see Global seed vault opens in Norway).
sentences.sContent_eng: More than four million samples will be preserved near the North Pole without the need for expensive cryogenics (see Global seed vault opens in Norway).
sentences.sCn: 超过400万份种子保存在了北极附近，而不需要昂贵的低温保存（见  全球种子库在挪威开放）。

words.tran: 冷冻的（副词cryogenically）；低温学的；低温实验法的
[外科] 冷冻手术；[外科] 低温外科（等于cryogenic surgery）

trans.tranOther: the scientific study of very low temperatures
